entry.title: Lines in the Sand
entry.summary:
Author: PapySanzo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,844Chapters: 10/25Kudos: 360

Summary: In the icy streets of Camelot City, a homeless Merlin struggles to survive after escaping an abusive relationship. When a chance encounter brings him face-to-face with Arthur Pendragon, the real estate billionaire owning half of Albion, Merlin is thrown a lifeline in the form of a job. But Pendragon’s offer is for sex work: a position as his 24/7 live-in sub. More than reluctant, but desperate for shelter, Merlin agrees, and soon finds himself struggling as past traumas resurface…

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. entry.summary:
Author: SChryslerS

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,336Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 477

Summary: The great and wise sorcerer, the closest confidant and most trusted ally of King Arthur, was born a girl. This single truth changes nothing—his wisdom remains boundless, his power undiminished, his destiny unshaken. And yet, it changes everything, for within this paradox lies a secret, a force beyond mere magic, one that reshapes not only his own fate but the fate of the world itself.

entry.title: Bringer of Light, Darkness, Magic, and All Things Inbetween
entry.summary:
Author: witerwallyanerd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,780Chapters: 5/20Kudos: 20

Summary: My first fic guys! Say hello to god Merlin, sad Merlin, hurt Arthur, and really confused everyone else!-witerwallyanerdMerlin had been living a lie since he knew what one was. Ealdor lied in the border of Cenred’s kingdom and Camelot, and was much more tolerant of magic than Camelot was.Even so, you could only show so much ability before people got suspicious.So in Ealdor, it had always been playing down his abilities. He never imagined he was going to be hiding them completely. Merlin lived by Gaius’ rules, most of the time. Half the time. Whenever they didn’t get in his way, if he was being honest.However, recently, his magic had been itchy, for lack of better words. He felt it under his skin, in his veins, his hair. Heard it in every breath he breathed, every word that came from his mouth.

entry.title: Rocket Science Elective
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,307Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: A Modern Merlin Band AU.Merlin is a sexually frustrated astrophysicist with a few hang-ups related to a certain failed rock band in uni. Arthur is the spiteful, rebelling heir to a dynasty of classical musicians who wants nothing but to escape his father's shadow. Gwaine is a stripper who's maybe a bit (a lot) more passionate than most regarding the music he dances to. Gwen is the manager of her dad's metronome factory, who secretly envies her brother for making it as a musical theater actor. Elena is an unorthodox, spitfire producer with something to prove, something her dad's record label continues to sleep on.And this is the story of what would happen if these unlikely five were to start a band.

entry.title: All's Fair in Love and Snow
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,761Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: “Seems like you were right,” Arthur whispered softly.Merlin blinked up at him, curious. “Right about what?”Arthur smiled, his heart full. “This moment... it’s perfect.”Arthur’s chest heaved as he caught his breath, his eyes meeting Merlin’s. There was a moment of silence, the kind that felt full, as if neither of them needed to say anything to understand what the other was thinking. Arthur reached up, his hand almost instinctively brushing a stray snowflake from Merlin’s cheek. It was a gentle touch, a small thing, but in the quiet of the courtyard, it held a world of meaning.For a heartbeat, everything seemed to fall away—the snow, the castle, even the cold wind that had been swirling around them.-----------The first snow of winter fell gently around Arthur and Merlin as they stood in the castle courtyard, bundled in scarves and cloaks, savoring the serene beauty of the moment. After a playful snowball fight and bursts of laughter, they paused, breathless and close, as Arthur brushed a snowflake from Merlin’s cheek before softly kissing him, the chill air mingling with the warmth of their love.

entry.title: The Heart of the Kingdom
entry.summary:
Author: juliairian

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,779Chapters: 11/37Kudos: 57

Summary: "Camelot had to be different to suddenly accommodate such a person as Merlin. He could never have existed in Camelot before, and therefore, Camelot changed. There had to be shadows and secrets to keep Merlin safe, mysteries to bring them together, and silences for all the words they never said to each other."Merlin saves one man from Uther's pyre and never becomes Arthur's servant - instead, the two unlikely friends must defend Camelot and over time learn the truth about magic and what happened before the Purge. Will magic in Camelot gain two powerful protectors despite the world trying to keep them apart?

entry.title: For destiny's sake
entry.summary:
Author: dahko

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,822Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 10

Summary: After living his entire life trapped inside a castle, Merlin faces the opportunity to see the real world for the first time. The thing is, he tags along Prince Arthur Pendragon, who can't quite decide if he likes the sorcerer's presence. Yet they both feel in debt with eachother, and that feeling seems enough of a reason t not leave eachother's side despite their huge differences.As imminent danger and the threat of war lies upon them, they decide to work together to protect Camelot from Merlin's captor, who seems willing to do whatever it takes to get him back.ORMerthur Tangled-inspired AU c:

entry.title: The land of Arisla
entry.summary:
Author: Bandforlife18

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 91,842Chapters: 55/?Kudos: 119

Summary: When king Uthur of Camelot declared war on magic the queen of Arisla had faith in the great prophecy. So rather then wage war on a man grieving for his lost wife she hid Arisla away. In a land of myth, and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom rests on the shoulders of a young man.But how much can be placed on one's shoulders till they break and how many will be dragged down in the fall?All will be tested. Love, betrayal, destiny and destruction.

entry.title: A Truely Round Table
entry.summary:
Author: Desperatebookworm

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,548Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 47

Summary: Following on from the events of the New Pendragons, Arthur's quest to find his other siblings is in full swing. The future of Camelot relies on all of the Pendragons uniting to bring about the new Golden Age but Morgana and Agravaine have different plans. Will Arthur and Merlin be able to navigate their more complicated new relationship and fulfil the promise of Albion?
